heading: HB00110
0: AN ACT CONSTITUTING A NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION FOR CAPITAL RELOCATION

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00110
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONSTITUTING A NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION FOR CAPITAL RELOCATION
ABSTRACT : Aims to study the possibility and feasibility of capital relocation and transfer of the permanent seat of the government of the Philippines.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION ON 2018-05-23
